data.title: Who is RuPaul? Was the "Queen of Drag" married before Georges LeBar?
data.meta_description: Who is RuPaul? He is an American TV personality, musician, model, and actor. Discover hidden facts about his personal life, career and his marriage.
data.text:
In 2017, RuPaul revealed to the public that he was married. The revelation was a surprise because he rarely spoke openly about his relationships. Instead, his public life revolved around creating TV shows and music. But was he married before? Who is RuPaul, and who was his ex-wife?

TABLE OF CONTENTS

RuPaul's profile summary

Who is RuPaul?

Education

How did RuPaul get famous?

What is RuPaul’s net worth?

Is RuPaul gay?

Who is RuPaul's husband?

FAQs

RuPaul is an American TV personality, musician, model, and actor. He is known as the drag queen and RuPaul’s Drag Race judge. His iconic drag performances have earned him the nickname Queen of Drag. His extensive experience in the entertainment industry and support for the LGBTQ+ community have earned him praise amongst his peers.

RuPaul's profile summary

Full nameRuPaul Andre CharlesNickname Queen of DragGenderMaleDate of birth17 November 1960Age63 years old (as of 2024)Zodiac signScorpioPlace of birthSan Diego, California, United StatesCurrent residenceBeverly Hills, California, United StatesNationalityAmericanEthnicityBlackReligionUnreligiousSexualityGayHeight6'3" (193 cm)Weight172 lbs (78 kgs)Hair colourBaldEye colourBlackMotherErnestine CharlesFather Irving Andrew CharlesSiblings3 (Renetta Charles, Renae Charles, Rozy Charles)RelativesCory Booker (cousin)Marital statusMarriedPartnerGeorges LeBar (m. 2017)High schoolNorth Atlanta High School, Patrick Henry High SchoolCollegeNorthside School of Performing Arts ProfessionDrag Queen, TV personality, actor, musician, modelNet worth$60 millionInstagram@rupaulofficialTikTok@rupaulofficialX (Formerly Twitter)@RuPaulFacebookRuPaul

Who is RuPaul?

RuPaul is an American drag queen, TV personality, actor, musician and model. The actor was born RuPaul Andre Charles on 17 November 1960 in San Diego, California, United States. He is the son of Ernestine Charles (mother) and Irving Andrew Charles (father). Furthermore, he has three siblings, Renetta Charles, Renae Charles, and Rozy Charles.

Education

Andre grew up in the Brewster Projects in San Diego. He attended Patrick Henry High School in San Diego, California, and later transferred to Atlanta, where he enrolled at North Atlanta High School.

RuPaul got his higher education at Northside School of Performing Arts. But unfortunately, he did not graduate. Instead, he ventured into the entertainment industry.

How did RuPaul get famous?

RuPaul started his career as a musician in the early 1980s. He participated in underground cinemas and debuted on an Atlanta public-access variety show titled The American Music Show. However, he struggled as a musician throughout the 1980s. He succeeded in the 1990s when he recorded the dance/house album Supermodel of the World.

He released a video called Back to My Roots, critically acclaimed and ranked top charts worldwide. In the 2000s, he continued his momentum as an actor, producer, and director. He produced RuPaul’s Drag Race in 2008, which aired in February 2009. The reality TV show became a success and has become a franchise.

It has aired for 15 seasons and inspired many spin-off shows, including RuPaul's Drag U, RuPaul's Drag Race All Stars, and RuPaul's Secret Celebrity Drag Race. Furthermore, RuPaul’s Drag Race is now replicated in many countries worldwide. He has 15 studio albums, 42 music videos, and 68 singles.

The personality has appeared in 30 movies, 18 short films, and 69 TV shows. Andre is also the winner of 12 Primetime Emmy Awards. In 2017, Time Magazine included him on the list of Time's 100 most influential people. According to his IMDb profile, below are some of his acting credits.

YearFilm/TV show2023Trolls Band Together2023Nimona2023Ozi: Voice of the Forest2021-2022Chicago Party Aunt2022The Tiny Chef Show2022Zombies 32021-2022Amphibia2021Reno 911!: The Hunt for QAnon2018-2021Drag Tots2020Muppets Now

What is RuPaul’s net worth?

According to Celebrity Net Worth, his net worth is alleged to be $60 million. RuPaul has made money through the entertainment industry.

The drag queen has been a musician, selling millions of albums, starring in movies and TV shows, and producing many titles. Furthermore, he has made money from endorsements with beauty and fashion brands.

Is RuPaul gay?

RuPaul is gay. He has been openly gay for many years and advocates for LGBTQ+ rights. In his new memoir, The House of Hidden Meanings, the icon delves into his experiences as a Black gay youth in 1970s Atlanta. RuPaul reveals that he often felt a disconnect between himself and both communities.

I was confused. My understanding was that every gay person had the same experience that I did. I felt that thinking outside the box had to do with being gay, but that really wasn’t the case.

As I got older, I realized that there were different experiences.When I found my true tribe, what we had in common was thinking outside the box. We were bohemians who recognized that the emperor wasn’t wearing any clothes. Our creed was ‘Don’t be fooled by the superficial, get to the realness.

Who is RuPaul's husband?

The personality married his partner Georges LeBar in 2017. Georges is an Australian author, farmer, and business owner. He was born on 24 January 1973 in Perth, Australia.

RuPaul and Georges LeBar met in 1994. Georges was a rancher in Wyoming celebrating his 21st birthday when he met Andre on the dance floor of a club called Limelight.

Andre found Georges attractive because he was taller than him. Thus, he found somebody he could wrap his arms around. RuPaul and Georges dated for many years. Their relationship was unique because they split up several times before reuniting.

In 2017, Andre told the public that he was married to his partner of 23 years. He later revealed that his partner was Georges LeBar. As of 2024, RuPaul and Georges LeBar are still married.

In his 2024 memoir The House of Hidden Meanings, RuPaul dedicated a verse to his love Georges, which read:

For the love of my life, Georges LeBar, thank you for the love, laughter, sweetness and kindness to the love of his life. You are my favorite.

RuPaul's memoir delves into his life story before the fame and drag race. It covers the first 40 years of his life, focusing on his upbringing in San Diego, his early experiences in drag in Atlanta, and his rise to superstardom in New York City. He also talks more about his love life and how he met his husband.

Talking to BuzzFeed News in 2015 about his longtime partner, he stated:

He's so kind and funny. I remember praying, 'I want a sweet, sensitive man,' and I got an Australian who's just lovely.

The reality TV star discussed his open marriage and why it works for him and his husband in a 2019 Vanity Fair video interview.

I wouldn't want to put restraints on the person I love the most on this planet. Listen, if you get something that you cannot resist and that is gonna make you happy, go for it. Because the truth is, I know in my heart of hearts like I've ever known anything before, that man loves me more than anything else in this world.

Georges does not prefer the showbiz life. Instead, he spends his time at his 60,000-acre ranch in Wyoming. But the two meet every three weeks whenever Andre goes to Wyoming to visit his partner.

FAQs

How long has RuPaul been married? He has been married to his partner, Georges LeBar, since 2017.

Does RuPaul have kids? RuPaul does not have any biological children.

Who was RuPaul's ex-wife? Before he married Georges LeBar in 2017, Andre did not have a wife or an ex-wife.

How long has RuPaul been with his husband? RuPaul had known his husband for 23 years before marrying in 2017.

What is RuPaul’s gender? RuPaul has always referred to himself as male but is indifferent to gender-specific pronouns.

Why does RuPaul dress like a woman? RuPaul is a model who dresses in a drag style, which may sometimes involve dressing up as a woman.

Does RuPaul live with his partner? RuPaul and his partner do not live together but see each other every three weeks.

When was Georges LeBar and RuPaul's wedding? They got married on their 23rd anniversary.

Who is RuPaul? He is a famous drag queen and TV personality who is married to his long-term partner, Georges LeBar. The couple met in 1994 and married in 2017.

Tuko.co.ke also published an article about Brian Joseph McCook, who goes by his stage name Katya Zamolodchikova. He is a famous American drag queen, reality TV star, and comedian.

The celebrity is best known for their stint on the reality show RuPaul's Drag Race. The personality is also famous for other web series and talk shows such as The Trixie & Katya Show and UNHhhh.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
